00002  * @file    CAN/FIFO/main.c

00005  * @brief   Main program.

00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 #include "can_api.h"
00033 
00034 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00035   * @{
00036   */
00037 
00038 /** @addtogroup CAN_Examples CAN
00039   * @{
00040   */
00041 
00042 /** @addtogroup FIFO
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define CAN_SEND_ID         0x541
00048 #define CAN_RECV_ID         0x540
00049 
00050 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 u32 gCanTimeout;
00052 
00053 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 u8 flag;
00055 
00056 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 void CKCU_Configuration(void);
00058 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00059 void CAN_Configuration(void);
00060 void SysTick_Configuration(void);
00061 
00062 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 /*************************************************************************************************************
00064   * @brief  Main program.
00065   * @retval None
00066   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00067 int main(void)
00068 {
00069   CKCU_Configuration();               /* System Related configuration                                       */
00070   GPIO_Configuration();               /* GPIO Related configuration                                         */
00071   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);         /* LED1 configuration                                                 */
00072   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00073   printf("\r\n CAN FIFO Demo. System Core Clock %u \r\n", (unsigned int)SystemCoreClock);
00074 
00075   SysTick_Configuration();            /* Timebase 1ms                                                       */
00076 
00077   CAN_Configuration();                /* CAN Related configuration                                          */
00078 
00079   flag = 1;
00080 
00081   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00082 
00083   while(1)
00084   {
00085     can_msgTypeDef rmsg;
00086     can_msgTypeDef tmsg;
00087     s32 ret;
00088 
00089     ret = CANAPI_Receive(HT_CAN0);  /* Get CAN Status */
00090 
00091     if(ret == CAN_RET_BUSOFF_RCY)
00092     {
00093       /* CANbus at Bus-Off state */
00094       HT_CAN0->CR &= ~CAN_CR_INIT_Msk;
00095 
00096       /* Bus-Off recovery sequence.128 * 11 consecutive recessive bits.                     `                     */
00097       /* This example waits for the longest time, BitRate = 5K ==> (1/5K) * 128/11 = 0.282s .     */
00098       gCanTimeout=282; /* Delay 282ms */
00099       while(gCanTimeout){}
00100     }
00101 
00102     if((ret >= CAN_RET_RXOK) && (ret <= CAN_RET_RXOK_MAX))
00103     {
00104       /* Received Data */
00105       u8 n;
00106 
00107       for(n = 0; n < ret; n++)
00108       {
00109         int i;
00110         CANAPI_RecvMewData(&rmsg, HT_CAN0);
00111 
00112         printf("\r\nRx(==>), ID %06d, DLC %02d, EXT %d, RTR %d, Data: ", rmsg.arb_id._u32, rmsg.FMT.DLC._u16, rmsg.FMT.EXT, rmsg.FMT.RTR);
00113         for(i = 0; i<rmsg.FMT.DLC._u16; i++)
00114         {
00115           printf("%02X ", rmsg.data[i]);
00116         }
00117         printf("Finish\r\n");
00118         recvQ.rptr = CANAPI_PushToRingFIFO(recvQ.buf, &rmsg.arb_id.arr[0], recvQ.rptr, FIFO_DEPTH);
00119       }
00120 
00121       /*  Parsing massage. */
00122       while(CANAPI_Rmemdelta(recvQ.rptr, recvQ.sptr, FIFO_DEPTH))
00123       {
00124         recvQ.sptr = CANAPI_PopFromRingFIFO(&rmsg.arb_id.arr[0], recvQ.buf, recvQ.sptr, FIFO_DEPTH);
00125 
00126         if(rmsg.arb_id._u32 == CAN_RECV_ID)
00127         {
00128           sendQ.rptr = CANAPI_PushToRingFIFO(sendQ.buf, &rmsg.arb_id.arr[0], sendQ.rptr, FIFO_DEPTH);
00129         }
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133     if(ret == CAN_RET_IDLE)
00134     {
00135       /* BUS idle */
00136       if(flag)
00137       {
00138         /* Send a standard frame transmission after power-on, data 0xD0 0x04. */
00139         int i;
00140         flag = 0;
00141         /* Prepare data. */
00142         tmsg.data[0] = 0xd9;
00143         tmsg.data[1] = 0x04;
00144         tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16 = 2;
00145         CANAPI_SendOut(MSG_NUM17, &tmsg.data[0], tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16, HT_CAN0);
00146         tmsg.FMT.EXT = 0;
00147         printf("\r\nTx(<==), ID %06d, DLC %02d, EXT %d, RTR %d, Data: ", tmsg.arb_id._u32, tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16, tmsg.FMT.EXT, tmsg.FMT.RTR);
00148         for(i = 0; i<tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16; i++)
00149         {
00150           printf("%02X ", tmsg.data[i]);
00151         }
00152 
00153         /* Send message. */
00154         HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00155         while(!(HT_CAN0->SR & CAN_SR_TXOK_Msk));
00156 
00157         printf("Finish\r\n");
00158         /* clear TXOK flag. */
00159         HT_CAN0->SR &= ~CAN_SR_TXOK_Msk;
00160         /* Send message OK. */
00161         HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00162 
00163       }
00164 
00165       if(CANAPI_Rmemdelta(sendQ.rptr, sendQ.sptr, FIFO_DEPTH))
00166       {
00167         /* the messages will be transferred because "Send FIFO" is not empty. */
00168         int i;
00169         sendQ.sptr = CANAPI_PopFromRingFIFO(&tmsg.arb_id.arr[0], sendQ.buf, sendQ.sptr, FIFO_DEPTH);
00170         CANAPI_InitTxMsg(MSG_NUM17, CAN_DAT_MSG, CAN_EXT_ID, CAN_SEND_ID, HT_CAN0);
00171         CANAPI_SendOut(MSG_NUM17, &tmsg.data[0], tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16, HT_CAN0);
00172         tmsg.FMT.EXT = 1;
00173         printf("\r\nTx(<==), ID %06d, DLC %02d, EXT %d, RTR %d, Data: ", tmsg.arb_id._u32, tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16, tmsg.FMT.EXT, tmsg.FMT.RTR);
00174         for(i = 0; i<tmsg.FMT.DLC._u16; i++)
00175         {
00176           printf("%02X ", tmsg.data[i]);
00177         }
00178 
00179         /* Send message. */
00180         HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00181         while(!(HT_CAN0->SR & CAN_SR_TXOK_Msk));
00182         printf("Finish\r\n");
00183         /* Clear TXOK flag. */
00184         HT_CAN0->SR &= ~CAN_SR_TXOK_Msk;
00185         /* Send message OK */
00186         HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00187       }
00188     }
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*************************************************************************************************************
00193   * @brief  Configure the CAN.
00194   * @retval None
00195   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00196 void CAN_Configuration(void)
00197 {
00198   CANAPI_SetModeBitrate(CAN_NORMAL_MODE, BR_500K, HT_CAN0);
00199   CANAPI_SetInterrupt(CAN_CR_EIE_Msk | CAN_CR_IE_Msk, HT_CAN0);
00200 
00201   CANAPI_InitRxMsg(MSG_NUM1,
00202                   CAN_DAT_MSG,
00203                   CAN_STD_ID,
00204                   CAN_RECV_ID,
00205                   0x1fffffff,
00206                   FIFO_DEPTH,    /* fifo depth = 16.(MSG_NUM1~MSG_NUM16) */
00207                   HT_CAN0);
00208 
00209   CANAPI_InitTxMsg(MSG_NUM17,
00210                   CAN_DAT_MSG,
00211                   CAN_STD_ID,
00212                   CAN_SEND_ID,
00213                   HT_CAN0);
00214 
00215   recvQ.rptr = 0;
00216   recvQ.sptr = 0;
00217   recvQ.buf = &rmsgfifo.arr[0][0];
00218 
00219   sendQ.rptr = 0;
00220   sendQ.sptr = 0;
00221   sendQ.buf = &tmsgfifo.arr[0][0];
00222 }
00223 
00224 /*************************************************************************************************************
00225   * @brief  BFTM Configuration.
00226   * @retval None
00227   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00228 void SysTick_Configuration(void)
00229 {
00230   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK);       /* Default : CK_AHB/8                                 */
00231   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(SystemCoreClock / 8 / 1000); /* (CK_AHB/8/1000) = 1ms on chip                      */
00232   SYSTICK_IntConfig(ENABLE);                          /* Enable SYSTICK Interrupt                           */
00233   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00234   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);
00235 }
00236 
00237 /*************************************************************************************************************
00238   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00239   * @retval None
00240   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00241 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00242 {
00243   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00244   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO             = 1;
00245   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_CAN_IPN    = 1;
00246   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00247 }
00248 
00249 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00250   * @brief  Configure the GPIO ports.
00251   * @retval None
00252   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00253 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00254 {
00255   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CAN_TX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CAN_TX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_CAN);
00256   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CAN_RX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CAN_RX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_CAN);
00257 }
